resources.string:
Click mineField to sweep mines.

Long click on or hold the flag button then click on mines to Flag mines.

Click on Flagged Mine Cell to add question mark.

Long click on or hold flag button then click on mines to cancel flag.

Click on the uncovered tiles to reveal adjacent tiles if flagged right(question considered as flags)

Use the Cursor to help you through small buttons.

 Try to finish it before time runs out.

 Good Luck!
